name: arizona
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a state in the southwestern US, whose capital city is Phoenix: The day the storm hit, he travelled to Arizona. The weather is hot here in the desert of Arizona.
More examplesFewer examplesThe drive through Arizona was incredible.The impact in Arizona is likely to be small.
